caption:
Shannon Ashmore-McMath, owner of @LauriceNoire, has always had an eye for style. The Grand Rapids native and founder of the popular shoe boutique Low Heel No Heel is now stepping further into fashion with her newest venture: Laurice Noire, a Black woman-owned luxury handbag and accessories line.⁠
⁠
"I realized there are very few Black and Woman owned designers in the fashion industry- specifically when it comes to handbags. I have been working on this line for the past 2 years and designed the handbags myself and am excited that we are finally at the finish line." - Shannon⁠
⁠
After a sold-out soft launch last fall, the official Grand Opening is here. From tote bags to duffles, customers are already obsessed.⁠
⁠
✨ Shop now and enjoy Free Shipping plus 15% OFF with code: GRANDOPENING⁠
👜 Visit → www.LauriceNoire.com⁠
